metadata.title: CVE-2016-2559 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the format function inlibraries/sql-parser/src/Utils/Error.php in the SQL parser in phpMyAdmin4.5.x before 4.5.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via a crafted query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2559` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.0-2').
